biocontainers.name: bayesase
biocontainers.summary: Bayesian analysis of allele specific expression

biotools.summary: Bayesian analysis of allele-specific expression (BayesASE) is a complete bioinformatics pipeline that incorporates state-of-the-art error reduction techniques and a flexible Bayesian approach to estimating Allelic imbalance (AI) and formally comparing levels of AI between conditions.

bioschemas.name: BayesASE
bioschemas.summary: Bayesian analysis of allele-specific expression (BayesASE) is a complete bioinformatics pipeline that incorporates state-of-the-art error reduction techniques and a flexible Bayesian approach to estimating Allelic imbalance (AI) and formally comparing levels of AI between conditions.
